# Get Object
## Goal
Find all objects is related with hydroxyoctanoate (ChEBI ID = CHEBI:133719)

::: {.absolute left=50 top=200 width="50" height="250" style="font-size:70pt; "}
`Subject`
:::
::: {.absolute left=480 top=135 width="250" height="250" style="font-size:145pt; "}
`→`
:::
::: {.absolute left=300 top=350 width="50" height="250" style="font-size:70pt; "}
`predicate`
:::
::: {.absolute left=750 top=200 width="50" height="250" style="font-size:70pt; "}
Object
:::


## Code
-JS
```{.js code-line-numbers="2,3|4|5,6|7-9|10-14"}
SWDiscovery(config)
    .prefix("chebi","http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/CHEBI_")
    .prefix("skos","http://www.w3.org/2004/02/skos/core#")
    .something("some")
       .set(URI("chebi:133719"))
         .isSubjectOf(URI("skos:related"),"objetMeshTerm")
    .select("objetMeshTerm")
    .commit()
    .raw()
    .then((response) => {
        message = "<p>termes mesh associés à chebi:133719 ->"+response.results.bindings.length + "</p><li>" ;
        for (const binding of response.results.bindings) {
            message +=`<ul> ${binding["objetMeshTerm"].value} </ul>`;
        }
        message += "</li>"
        isOK(message);
```

## Exercice

* Get all compounds related to "Acid, Acyclic" in CID RDF database
    + "Acid, Acyclic" => mesh terme D000144
    + isObjectOf

## Solution
```{.js}
SWDiscovery(config)
    .prefix("mesh","http://id.nlm.nih.gov/mesh/")
    .prefix("skos","http://www.w3.org/2004/02/skos/core#")
    .something("some")
       .set(URI("mesh:D000144"))
         .isObjectOf(URI("skos:related"),"compounds")
    .select("compounds")
    .commit()
    .raw()
    .then((response) => {
        message = "<p>Suject related mesh D000144 ->"+response.results.bindings.length + "</p><li>" ;
        for (const binding of response.results.bindings) {
            message +=`<ul> ${binding["compounds"].value} </ul>`;
        }
        message += "</li>"
        isOK(message);
```
